spec_data.Name: petsc-openmpi
spec_data.Description:
PETSc, pronounced PET-see (the S is silent), is a suite of data structures
and routines for the scalable (parallel) solution of scientific applications
modeled by partial differential equations.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 23 Nov 2017 10:25:08 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Portable Extensible Toolkit for Scientific Computation (OpenMPI)
